name: Multilayer Barrier (Undispellable)
description: Increases Hit Chance by 50% and is unaffected by debuffs and some harmful effects.

name: Phantom Sword (Unique Effect)
description: When attacking, if the target is a Hero, ignores damage reduction and damage sharing effects, and when defeating an enemy, Phantom Sword changes into Neo Phantom Sword.

name: Neo Phantom Sword (Unique Effect)
description: When attacking, if the target is a Hero, ignores damage reduction and damage sharing effects, and increases damage dealt proportional to the target's max Health. Dispelled after attacking.

name: Increase Effectiveness
description: Increases Effectiveness by 50%.

name: Deify (Undispellable)
description: When attacking, increases Critical Hit Chance by 50%, and when attacked, decreases damage suffered by 50%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

name: Exploiting Weak Points
description: When attacking, increases damage dealt by 20%. After attacking, this effect is dispelled.

name: Increase Attack
description: Increases Attack by 50%.

name: Increase Attack (Greater)
description: Increases Attack by 75%.

name: Revive
description: Upon receiving lethal damage, revives with 30% of max Health.

name: Blood Aura (Undispellable)
description: Increases Effectiveness and Speed by 30%.

name: Challenge (Undispellable)
description: After using a basic skill, when the target is a Hero, deals additional damage equivalent to 10% of the target's max Health. Dispelled after the effect activates and increases Speed of the bearer for 2 turns.

name: Chain of Chiron (Undispellable)
description: After attacking, inflicts a random debuff (Stun, Cannot Buff, Decrease Hit Chance, Restrict) on the target for 1 turn.

name: Enhanced Dual Attack (Undispellable)
description: When an ally except for the bearer uses a skill and the bearer is available to use a Dual Attack, attacks the same target with a basic attack. Enhanced Dual Attack is dispelled when the bearer uses a Dual Attack.

name: Counterattack
description: Counterattacks with basic skill when attacked. Is not triggered by extra attacks or counterattacks.

name: Increase Critical Hit Chance
description: Increase Critical Hit Chance by 50%.

name: Increase Critical Hit Damage
description: Increase Critical Hit Damage by 50%.

name: Increase Critical Hit Resistance
description: Increase Critical Hit Resistance by 50%.

name: Immunity
description: Cannot be affected by any debuffs or some harmful effects.

name: Increase Defense
description: Increase Defense by 60%.

name: Daydream (Undispellable)
description: After attacking, inflicts a random debuff (Decrease Attack, Decrease Hit Chance, Decrease Speed, Cannot Buff) on the target for 1 turn.

name: Archdemon's Might (Undispellable)
description: Increases Attack by 30% and Evasion by 50%.

name: Perception (Undispellable)
description: Increase Critical Hit Chance and Critical Hit Damage by 15%.

name: Cascade (Undispellable)
description: After attacking, deals 4,000 fixed damage per target. Dispelled after attacking.

name: Damage Limit
description: When attacked, damage suffered in one attack does not exceed 35% of max Health.

name: Increase Evasion
description: Increases Evasion by 50%.

name: Elemental Wisdom (Unique Effect)
description:
Increases Defense by 5%, Can stack up to 3 times.
Elemental Wisdom granted by an allay other than the caster stacks only once per element.

name: Skill Nullifier
description: Nullifies damage from skills.

name: Explosives (Undispellable)
description: After attacking, plants bombs on the target for 2 turns. Dispelled after attacking.

name: Flame Alchemist (Undispellable)
description: lncreases Hit Chance and Attack by 20%. Flame Alchemist is dispelled after being attacked by an Ice elemental enemy.

name: Oasis All-Ride Pass (Undispellable)
description: Does not cost any Soul to activate the first Soulburn. Dispelled once the effect is activated.

name: Special Friendship (Undispellable)
description: After attacking on the bearer's turn, a critical hit deals additional damage proportional to the bearer's max Health to the target.

name: Escort
description: The bearer receives 30% of the damage suffered by all allies in their place. When more than one damage distribution effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

name: Ferocious Stand (Undispellable)
description: Allies except for the bearer cannot be selected as a target for attacks.

name: Vigor (Undispellable)
description: Increase Attack and Defense by 30%.

name: Hawk's Eye (Undispellable)
description: Increases Speed and Critical Hit Damage by 30%.

name: Continuous Heal
description: Recovers 15% of max Health at the start of every turn. This effect can stack.

name: Stealth
description: When other allies are present, cannot be selected as a target for attacks. When suffering an attack that targets all allies, grants damage reduction and is dispelled when suffering damage from an attack.

name: Ice Cream (Undispellable)
description: After being attacked, recovers 20% of max Health. Dispelled after being attacked.

name: Illusion (Unique Effect)
description: When an ally capable of being attacked is still remaining, the caster cannot be selected as a target for attacks.

name: Immortal
description: Cannot die for a certain number of turns.

name: Increase Hit Chance
description: Increase Hit Chance by 50%.

name: Indomitable (Undispellable)
description: Increases Defense and Effect Resistance by 30%.

name: Invincible
description: Nullifies all damage.

name: Loveliness (Undispellable)
description: "Don't stop there, serve me already, meow!"

name: Rage (Undispellable)
description: Increase Attack and Speed by 20%.

name: Immense Power (Unique Effect)
description: Increases Attack by 15% and revives with 50% Health after receiving lethal damage. Can revive only once per battle.

name: Dragon Eye (Milim Eye) (Undispellable)
description: Increases Hit Chance and Evasion by 20%.

name: Demon Mode (Undispellable)
description: Unaffected by debuffs and some harmful effects. When attacking ignores Effect Resistance. This effect only applies to Hero skills.

name: Rampage (Undispellable)
description: Increases Speed and Evasion by 20%.

name: Increase Penetration Resistance
description: Increases Penetration Resistance by 50%.

name: Possession (Undispellable)
description: Increases Attack by 25%. Counterattacks when suffering a critical hit.

name: Barrier
description: When suffering damage, absorbs a certain amount of damage instead of Health.

name: Reflect
description: When attacked, reflects 30% of the damage suffered to the attacker. Reflected damage cannot be higher than the bearer's max Health.

name: Increase Effect Resistance
description: Increases Effect Resistance by 50%.

name: Swift Attack
description: At the end of the turn, increases Combat Readiness by 50%. Dispelled when the effect is activated.

name: Shyness (Undispellable)
description: Solitaria... You said it wouldn't be revealing!

name: Idol (Undispellable)
description: My live show won't stop until my turn is over!

name: Skill Effect Nullifier
description: Nullifies an effect from skills of enemy Heroes and artifacts.

name: Increase Speed
description: Increase Speed by 30%.

name: Spirit's Blessing (Undispellable)
description: Increases Effect Resistance by 60%.

name: Spirit Lord's Protection (Undispellable)
description: Upon dying, revives with 50% Health and increases Combat Readiness by 50%.

name: Star's Blessing (Undispellable)
description: Increases Attack and Critical Hit Damage by 15%.

name: Vampirism
description: When attacking, absorbs 30% of damage dealt as Health.

name: Spoils (Unique Effect)
description: Increases Attack, Health, and Defense by 20%. Can stack up to 4 times. Upon death, dispels all Pilfer from all enemies.

name: Bzzt! (Undispellable)
description: After attacking, inflicts 2,000 additional damage and up to 10% injuries on all enemies.

name: Torrent (Undispellable)
description: After attacking with a basic skill, if it is a Single Attack, deals additional damage to the target proportional to damage dealt. Torrent is dispelled after attacking.

name: Pestilence (Undispellable)
description: After attacking on the bearer's turn, inflicts venom for 1 turn and at the end of the turn, detonates venom effects inflicted on the enemy.

name: Oath of Punishment (Undispellable)
description: Unaffected by any debuffs and some harmful effects. After attacking on the bearer's turn, deals 2,500 fixed damage to the target.

name: Weakness Shared (Undispellable)
description: When an ally attacks, if the target is an Elite or Boss monster, increases damage dealt by 10%.

name: Mind's Eye (Undispellable)
description: When attacking, inflicts injuries. The severity of injuries increases proportional to damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to 10% every time this skill is used.

name: Willful Flame (Undispellable)
description: When a Fire element ally attacks, penetrates the target's Defense by 15%.

name: Omen (Unique Effect)
description: Something is watching.

name: Restrict
description: Cannot receive Combat Readiness increase effects other than that provided by the Speed stat.

name: Decrease Attack
description: Decrease Attack by 50%

name: Burn
description: At the start of the turn, suffers huge damage proportional to the caster's Attack.

name: Decrease Hit Chance
description: Decreases Hit Chance by 50%.

name: Bleed
description: At the start of the turn, suffers damage proportional to the caster's Attack.

name: Bomb
description: At the end of the duration, suffers damage proportional to the caster's Attack and is stunned for 1 turn. Duration cannot be extended or decreased, and stun effect ignores Effect Resistance.

name: Cannot Buff
description: Cannot receive any buffs.

name: Class Debuff
description:
Thief, Warrior, Ranger, Mage: Decreased Attack
Knight, Soul-Weaver: Decreased Defense

name: Curse
description: When an ally except for the bearer is attacked by a Single Attack, additionally inflicts a portion of the damage on the bearer. The additional damage is inflicted at the end of the turn.

name: Death Sentence (Undispellable)
description: At the start of someone's 12th turn, deals 50,000 fixed damage to the bearer. Ignores damage sharing effects. Dispelled when the caster dies.

name: Beguile
description: At the end of the turn, deals additional damage to all allies except for the bearer equivalent to 10% of their respective max Health. Beguile effect applies to Heroes only, and is dispelled once the effect is activated.

name: Decrease Defense
description: Decreases Defense by 70%.

name: Seal
description: Passive skill effects do not activate. Applies to Heroes only.

name: Decrease Speed
description: Decreases Speed by 30%

name: Poison
description: At the start of the turn, suffers damage equivalent to 5% of max Health.

name: Fear
description: Cannot act for a certain number of turns. At the start of the turn, has a 40% chance to be dispelled.

name: Frostbite
description: Cannot be subject to any damage reduction or damage sharing effects. Does not affect damage suffered amount limit effect. Frostbite effect applies to Heroes only.

name: Unhealable
description: Cannot receive recover Health effects.

name: Block
description: Unaffected by any buffs, some beneficial effects, and dispel debuff effects except when granted by the bearer. Applies to Heroes only.

name: Volatility (Unique Effect)
description: Increases Attack by 15% but increases damage suffered by 10%.

name: Magic Nail
description: When attacked, inflicts additional damage proportional to the attacker's Attack.

name: Cannot Counterattack
description: Disables counterattack. Cannot Counterattack does not apply to monsters.

name: Provoke
description: At the start of the turn, forcibly uses basic skill on the target that inflicted provoke.

name: Redirected Provoke
description: At the start of the turn, forcibly uses basic attack skill on the enemy with the highest max Health.

name: Bind
description: When it's not the bearer's turn, cannot activate additional skills, counterattacks, and Dual Attacks. Applies to Heroes only.

name: Silence
description: When selecting a skill on the bearer's turn, cannot select skills other than the basic skill.

name: Sleep
description: Cannot act for a certain number of turns. Decreases Critical Hit Resistance and Evasion by 100% and is dispelled when suffering damage from an attack.

name: Stigma
description: Decreases amount recovered by 50% and reduces the effect of Combat Readiness increases by 50%.

name: Stun
description: Cannot act for a certain number of turns.

name: Target
description: Increases damage suffered by 15% and decreases Evasion by 15%.

name: Pilfer (Unique Effect)
description: Decreases Attack, Health, and Defense by 20% and grants Spoils to the attacker. Can only apply to Heroes and remains even after dying.

name: Trauma (Unique Effect)
description: Decreases Defense by 70%, but increases Attack and Speed by 100%. If the Defense prior to the effect of trauma is 2000 or higher, the stat increase effects are doubled.

name: Vampiric Touch
description: When attacked, recovers 10% of the attacker's max Health.

name: Venom
description: At the start of the turn, suffers damage equivalent of 10% of max Health and is inflicted with injuries proportional to damage suffered. Venom effect applies to Heroes only.

name: Rupture
description: When attacked, inflicts additional damage proportional to max Health. Applies to Heroes only.

name: Abundance (Unique Effect)
description: After attacking, inflicts 2,000 additional damage on the target.

name: Offering (Unique Effect)
description: Grants 70% damage sharing of damage received by all allies. Upon receiving lethal damage, grants immortality for 1 turn. Immortality can only be activated once per battle.

name: Collapse
description: Decreases max Health by 25%. This effect is doubled when applied to Heroes.

name: Sacred Covenant (Undispellable)
description: Cannot be affected by any debuffs or some harmful effects. Upon dying, revives with 100% Health.

name: Demon Blade Unleashed (Unique Effect)
description: Increases Attack by 200% and cannot die for a certain number of turns, but cannot be subject to damage sharing effects.

name: Solution (Unique Effect)
description: Enhances the next Once-in-a-Lifetime Research. Dispelled after activating the effect. Remains even after reviving.

name: Defensive Magic (Undispellable)
description: When attacked, consumes 4 Soul, nullifying damage from skills.

name: Promotion (Undispellable)
description: Increases Attack, Defense, and max Health by 5%.
